alert.note: Alert for City of Winchester; Clarke; Frederick; Warren (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 07 at 12:46PM EDT until September 07 at 1:30PM EDT by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: The National Weather Service in Sterling Virginia has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Frederick County in northwestern Virginia... North central Warren County in northwestern Virginia... Southwestern Clarke County in northwestern Virginia... The City of Winchester in northwestern Virginia... * Until 130 PM EDT. * At 1245 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Stephens City, or near Strasburg, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damaging winds will cause some trees and large branches to fall. This could injure those outdoors, as well as damage homes and vehicles. Roadways may become blocked by downed trees. Localized power outages are possible. Unsecured light objects may become projectiles. * Locations impacted include... Winchester, Millwood Pike, Stephens City, Middletown, Boyce, White Post, Greenwood, Reliance, Armel, Briggs, Millwood, Nineveh, Albin, and Cedarville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: City of Winchester; Clarke; Frederick; Warren
